name: Outlook 15 Attachment Data
summary: Learn about .OLK15MSGATTACH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When a user views an email in Outlook 15, the program often first loads a local copy of that email from a series of OLK15 files. This allows Outlook 15 to show email content to users more quickly.

If an email has an attachment(s), information about that attachment (such as the attachment's name) is saved in an OLK15MSGATTACH file. Outlook 15 stores OLK15MSGATTACH files in the following directory:
NOTE: Other Outlook 15 message data is saved in .OLK15MESSAGE and .OLK15MSGSOURCE files.

description: An OLK15MSGATTACH file is a data file created by Microsoft Outlook 15 for Mac, an email and calendar program. It contains information about one or more attachments to an email. OLK15MSGATTACH files are similar to .OLK14MSGATTACH files, which are created by Outlook 2011.

instructions: OLK15MSGATTACH files are not meant to be directly opened by users. However, you can use Gladwev OLK14 Message Recovery Tool (Mac) to recover the message data your OLK15MSGATTACH files (and other OLK15 files) contain.
